nodes.text: Ben Solo's calligraphy set was a calligraphy set owned by Padawan Ben Solo during his training in Jedi Master Luke Skywalker's Jedi temple. It included a set of pens, a box with perforations in the lid which served as pen sockets, and parchment scrolls with Jedi insights. The calligraphy set was sitting on Solo's nightstand, next to his Jedi lightsaber, the night he was confronted by his uncle, Skywalker.
